name: Real-Time Product Search
description: Extremely Fast and Simple API for searching product offers and reviews across multiple major sources. With just one API, users can access comprehensive and real-time product information, simplifying the search process and improving efficiency.

api_methods.name: Search
api_methods.description: Search for product offers - both free-form queries and GTIN/EAN are supported. Each page contains up to 30 product offers. Infinite pagination/scrolling is supported using the *page* parameter.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Free-form search query or a GTIN/EAN (e.g. *0194252014233*).

parameters.name: min_rating
parameters.description:
Return products with rating greater than the specified value.
Possible values: `1`, `2`, `3`, `4`.

parameters.name: product_condition
parameters.description:
Only return products with a specific condition.
Possible values: `NEW`, `USED`, `REFURBISHED`.

parameters.name: max_shipping_days
parameters.description: Only return product offers that offer shipping/delivery of up to specific number of days (i.e. shipping speed).

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description:
Only return product offers from specific stores (comma separated list of store id's). Store IDs can be obtained from the Google Shopping URL after using the **Seller** filter by taking the part after the `merchagg:` variable within the `tbs` parameter.

When filtering for a certain Seller / Store on Google Shopping, a URL similar to the following is shown on the address bar: `https://www.google.com/search?gl=us&tbm=shop&q=shoes&tbs=mr:1,merchagg:m100456214|m114373355`, in that case, the Store IDs are **m100456214** and **m114373355** - to filter for these stores, set store_id=m100456214,m114373355.

parameters.name: on_sale
parameters.description:
Only return product offers that are currently on sale.
Default: `false`.

parameters.name: free_returns
parameters.description:
Only return product offers that offer free returns.
Default: `false`.

parameters.name: free_shipping
parameters.description:
Only return product offers that offer free shipping/delivery.
Default: `false`.

parameters.name: max_price
parameters.description: Only return product offers with price lower than a certain value.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Sort product offers by best match, top rated, lowest or highest price.
Possible values: `BEST_MATCH`, `TOP_RATED`, `LOWEST_PRICE`, `HIGHEST_PRICE`.
Default: `BEST_MATCH`.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: Only return product offers with price greater than a certain value.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Results page to return.
Default: `1`.

utterances.utterance: Find me some Nike shoes with a minimum rating of 4 and available in new condition.
I'm looking for a Samsung Galaxy phone that ships within 3 days and is on sale.
Show me offers for a Dyson vacuum cleaner with free returns and free shipping.
Can you find a laptop under $1000 with a minimum rating of 3?
I need a list of Apple watches sorted by lowest price, available in the UK.
Find me a Canon camera with a price range between $500 and $1000.
I'm searching for a used iPad with free shipping and available in Spanish.
Look for a PlayStation 5 from specific stores with IDs m100456214 and m114373355.
Can you find me a refurbished MacBook Pro with a minimum rating of 2?
Show me offers for a GoPro camera sorted by top rated and available in Canada.

api_methods.name: Product Offers
api_methods.description: Get all offers available for a product.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Product id of the product for which to fetch offers.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the offers for the product with ID 11577822456427762145?
I need the product offers for item 98765432109876543210 in Germany.
Find the offers for product ID 12345678901234567890 in French.
What are the available offers for the product with ID 19283746556473829101 in Japan?
Get me the offers for product ID 56473829101928374655 in Spanish.
Show me the offers for the product with ID 10293847561029384756 in Canada.
I want to see the offers for product ID 56473829101928374655 in Italian.
Please find the offers for the product with ID 91827364554637281920 in the UK.
Can you get the offers for product ID 56473829101928374655 in Chinese?
Retrieve the offers for the product with ID 11223344556677889900 in Australia.

api_methods.name: Product Reviews
api_methods.description: Get all product reviews. Infinite pagination/scrolling is supported using the *limit* and *offset* parameters.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Product id of the product for which to fetch reviews.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description:
Number of reviews to skip.
Valid values: integers from 0-30000
Default: `0`.

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description:
Only return reviews with user rating greater than the specified value.
Valid values: 1-5.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Maximum number of product reviews to return.
Valid values: integers from 0-100.
Default: `10`.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me reviews for the product with ID 11577822456427762145?
I need reviews for the product 11577822456427762145 in French.
Fetch reviews for product 11577822456427762145 from Canada.
Get me reviews for product ID 11577822456427762145 with a rating of at least 4.
I want to see up to 20 reviews for the product 11577822456427762145.
Show me reviews for product 11577822456427762145 in German with a minimum rating of 3.
Can you get reviews for product ID 11577822456427762145 from the UK in English?
Retrieve reviews for product 11577822456427762145 with a rating above 2, limited to 5 reviews.
I need reviews for product 11577822456427762145 in Spanish from Mexico.
Get reviews for product ID 11577822456427762145 with a minimum rating of 5, in Italian.

api_methods.name: Product Details
api_methods.description: Get the details of a specific product by product id. Returns the full product details in addition to reviews sample, photos, product specs and more information.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Product id of the product for which to get full details.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the details for the product with ID 11577822456427762145?
I need information about the product with ID 98765432109876543210 in French.
Get me the product details for ID 12345678901234567890, and make sure it's in German.
What are the details for the product with ID 19283746556473829101 in the UK?
I'd like to see the product details for ID 56473829101928374655 in Spanish for Spain.
Please provide the details for the product with ID 10293847561029384756 in Japanese.
Can you give me the product details for ID 56473829101928374655 in Canada?
I want to know more about the product with ID 91827364554637281920 in Italian.
Fetch the product details for ID 11223344556677889900 in the US, but in Portuguese.
Show me the details for the product with ID 99887766554433221100 in Australia.
